days_in_progress_to_closed.description: Days from in-progress to closed status

days_sprint_start_to_in_progress.description: Days from sprint start to in-progress status

epic_issue_id.description: ID of the parent epic issue

epic_issue_key.description: Key of the parent epic issue

epic_project_key.description: Project key of the parent epic

epic_snapshot.description: Snapshot or summary of the epic

epic_status.possible_values: ["Closed","Dev Complete","Done","Draft","In Code Review","In Progress","Needs Grooming","ON DECK","On Hold","Open","PLATFORM-INBOX","Product Requirements","QA","Ready for Dev","Resolved","To Do","With QA"]

fix_version.description: Version or release the issue is fixed in

priority.description: Priority level of the issue (numeric scale)
